Caption: Dignitaries at the table during high tea
Description: Mrs. Shanti Sengupto is seated (third from left) at the table. In his interview with Prof. Ajit Kolar, Mr. R. Natarajan, the first Registrar of IIT Madras describes Mrs. Shanti Sengupto as “a gift to us”. He goes on to say that “as the first lady of the campus, she was very social, she didn’t have any airs about her”.
